CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: This approach has provided a remarkable short - circuit current density ( J SC ) of 16 mA / cm^2 , 3 whereas , in general , the V OC has suffered 4 because of a higher than the HOMO optimal energy level in order to pursue a lower bandgap.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| J SC |
| V OC |
| HOMO |

Note:

* J SC stands for short-circuit current density
* V OC stands for open-circuit voltage
* HOMO stands for highest occupied molecular orbital

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities that clearly refer to "Material name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| HOMO |

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, "J SC" and "V OC", do not clearly refer to material names, and therefore are not included in the table.
